data.title: 准备以至少 30 秒的时间回答以下问题
data.subject: Describe someone who is well-organized.
data.answer: My friend William is an organized person, he always keeps his desk clean, and his house is tidy and neat. He is punctual, finishes projects with time to spare, and always knows exactly where to find what he needs when he needs it. He uses a variety of tools and methods to accomplish his goals and priorities in life. Instead of having an overwhelming number of commitments and little idea where to start, he has a clear sense of what's important. He keeps track of what he needs to accomplish and when. For instance, he uses mobile phone apps with pop-up reminders. I have learned quite a lot from William in terms of how to stay organized, and now I am also well-organized. (123字)
